text: wltelmann -ayha alrswl- 'ana alyhwd 'ashada alnaas raghbatan fi tul alhayat ayana kanat hadhih alhayat min aldhllat walmhant, bal tazid raghbatihim fi tul alhayat ealaa rghbat almshrkyn. yatamanaa alyahudii 'ana yaeish 'alf snt, wala yubedh hdha aleumr altawil 'iina hasal min eadhab allh. wallah taealaa la yakhfaa ealayh shay' min 'aemalahum wsyjazyhm ealayha bima ysthqwn min aledhab
